about_the_game:
"Just a SHMUP?" Is a 3D game with original gameplay, you never know which situations will have to face the Captain.
You’ll be a part of his adventure and face a lot of different enemies and sometimes surprising ones.
The game will surprise you with its graphics, music and also its interactivity, for even more immersion in the game.


There is various gameplay thanks to the many enemies and situations I have created for you.
The enemies have varied tactical patterns, and great bosses are of course waiting for you at the end of the levels.
Fortunately, you can count on a whole arsenal and bonuses and hidden weaponry, to be collected as the game progresses.

Just a SHMUP? is also a game with beautiful and various environments, it’s not only a shoot’em up in space.


Each level has a different atmosphere and its own surprises!

Custom equipment

Choose your ship among three fighters with different attributes and customize it with the color you prefer.

You will have a partner who will come to help you when needed, to balance the fight when it gets too hot!

What makes Just a SHMUP unique?


  • The gameplay, the spirit of the game, its wacky style!
  • Throughout the game, you will go from surprises to surprises.
  • During the game, you will also have the pleasure of discovering many references and winks. I won't tell you more, it will be a surprise.
  • You can unlock content by completing the game.
  • And more…

  • Processor: Quad core AMD or Intel processor @ 2.8 GHz or faster

  • Graphics: GTX 1050, AMD RX 550 or newer
